title: Four COVID-19 fatalities confirmed
body_lines: Sri Lanka’s COVID-19 death toll rose to 16,485 following the confirmation of four COVID-19 fatalities on Sunday.

According to the Epidemiology Unit, 76.27% of the total COVID-19 deaths are over 60 years, 22.41% are between 30 and 59 years, and 1.32% are below 30 years. Three COVID-19 fatalities confirmed on Sunday were from the over-60 age group and one was from the 30 to 59 age group.
Zero COVID-19 fatalities were confirmed from the under-30 age group on Sunday.
Three COVID-19 fatalities confirmed on Sunday were male and one was female. A total of 9,303 COVID-19 deaths confirmed to date are male and 7,182 are female.
